column5: I have some time coming to me in September, and are entertaining the thought of renting a cottage for 3-4 days up to a week to take off with sweetie and do some R&R and of course fishing!  The question is where???? Some thoughts... @3 hour drive from the Hamilton area Good fishing, Walleye , Perch etc, have done Quinte lots. Nice place, doesn't have to be big and not a bank breaker!   Any suggestions Thanks Jeff
Mailtand or Saugeen rivers for the start of the salmon run? About 2 hours to the Maitland and 3 to the Saugeen from Hamilton.
PROMISED LAND CAMP GOOGLE IT  PROMISED LAND CAMP=BEST CAMP IN WORLD -LITTLE ANGLER(THE OWNERS ARE FROM HAMILTON)
Lakair at the west arm of Lake Nippissing   www.lakair.com  Maureen

Hello Jeff,  If you are looking for a no frills private cottage, I may be looking at renting my place for the month of September as it is a quieter time of the cottaging season.  My cottage is located on the shores of Bain lake (15 mins. north of Sturgeon Falls) Here is a panoramic view of the place thanks to T.J.. Oh yeah btw.. Thanks T.J!!  www.westnipissingouest.com/panorama0074.html
Thanks guys.  Kind of thinking about Stoney Lake??? Anyone fished it?
Give Sunrise Resort a try Lower Buckhorn http://www.sunriseresort.ca/september.html
